titles.title: A bill to provide a 1-year extension of the applicability of the authority to transfer funds under the programs for block grants regarding mental health and substance abuse.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

term.name: Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

bill.summary: 9/23/1994--Introduced. Amends the Public Health Service Act to provide a one-year extension of the applicability to mental health and substance abuse block grant programs of specified provisions regarding transfers between allotments.
